Package org.odk.collect.android.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutActivity  
    ActivityUtils  
    AndroidShortcuts
    Allows the user to create desktop shortcuts to any form currently avaiable to Collect
    BaseGeoMapActivity
    Implementation details common to the geo activities.
    BearingActivity  
    CaptureSelfieActivity  
    CaptureSelfieVideoActivity  
    CollectAbstractActivity  
    DeleteSavedFormActivity  
    DrawActivity
    Modified from the FingerPaint example found in The Android Open Source Project.
    FillBlankFormActivity
    Responsible for displaying all the valid forms in the forms directory.
    FormDownloadListActivity
    Responsible for displaying, adding and deleting all the valid forms in the forms directory.
    FormEntryActivity
    FormEntryActivity is responsible for displaying questions, animating transitions between questions, and allowing the user to enter data.
    FormHierarchyActivity  
    FormListActivity  
    FormMapActivity
    Show a map with points representing saved instances of the selected form.
    GeoPointActivity  
    GeoPointMapActivity
    Allow the user to indicate a location by placing a marker on a map, either by touching a point on the map or by tapping a button to place the marker at the current location (obtained from GPS or other location sensors).
    GeoPolyActivity  
    InstanceChooserList
    Responsible for displaying all the valid instances in the instance directory.
    InstanceUploaderActivity
    Activity to upload completed forms.
    InstanceUploaderListActivity
    Responsible for displaying all the valid forms in the forms directory.
    MainMenuActivity
    Responsible for displaying buttons to launch the major activities.
    NotificationActivity  
    ScannerWithFlashlightActivity
    Custom Scannner Activity extending from Activity to display a custom layout form scanner view.
    SplashScreenActivity  
    ViewOnlyFormHierarchyActivity
    Displays the structure of a form along with the answers for the current instance.
    WebViewActivity
